pages.text: $(l)(Passive-ShipDestroyed)/$$(br)Suppression behaves exactly like $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/counterfire)Counterfire/$, with only two differences: It triggers when its owner ship sinks and it typically damages more tiles than Counterfire will.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)You don't need to take out ships with this ability straight away. You can wait to avoid having to deal with this passive, and may decide to take it out as late as possible unless you want to remove the ship's active ability.

$(li)Remember that passive abilities can't trigger other passive abilities. If you're lucky, one of your own ship's passive abilities may end up taking out a ship that has this passive ability, in which case this passive doesn't trigger!$(li)Just like $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/salvo)Salvos/$, Suppression only deals 1 damage to $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/energy_shield)Energy Shields/$ regardless of how much of the ability actually hit the shield.
